original_title: Mad Cow Disease: The Great British Beef Scandal
overview: The story of Britain's biggest ever food scandal. Since 1996 almost 200 people have died from vCJD, whilst the cattle disease BSE has been responsible for the death of over four million cows. It has cost the NHS over a billion pounds and virtually destroyed the British beef industry in the 1990s.
title: Mad Cow Disease: The Great British Beef Scandal
